attributes.action: Scrap the Severn bridge toll charge
attributes.additional_details:
The Severn bridge toll is the highest priced toll in the U.K. I believe the high cost of this toll is damaging to new business coming to Wales as well as tourism. My e
petition is for the toll charge to be scrapped. Or at least make it free for the local populace in Bristol and surrounding area

Don Deacon B.A. (Hons.)
The Anchor Inn Tintern
Monmouthshire
